acquireTime.description: The time when the current lease was acquired.

holderIdentity.description: The identity of the holder of a current Lease.

leaseDurationSeconds.description: A duration that candidates for a Lease need to wait to force acquire it. This is measure against time of last observed `renewTime`.

leaseTransitions.description: The number of transitions of a Lease between holders.

renewTime.description: The time when the current holder of a Lease has last updated the Lease.
